mandirs.Name: Shri Banke Bihari Ji Mandir
mandirs.description: Banke Bihari Temple is located in Biharipura in Vrindavan Dham in Mathura district in India. It is one of the ancient and famous temples of India. Banke Bihari is a form of Krishna which is displayed in it. It was constructed by Swami Haridas in 1864.

mandirs.Name: Radha Rani Mandir (Barsana)
mandirs.description: The Radha Barsana Temple is a Hindu temple in Barsana, India. It is dedicated to Radha, the consort of Krishna, and is one of the most important pilgrimage sites for devotees of Radha and Krishna.

mandirs.Name: Prem Mandir Vrindavan
mandirs.description: Prem Mandir is located in Vrindavan. It was constructed by Jagadguru Kripalu Maharaj and dedicated to Radha Krishna. It was inaugurated on 17 February after 11 years of construction.

mandirs.Name: Iskon Temple Vrindavan
mandirs.description: ISKCON Vrindavan, also called Sri Krishna Balaram Mandir, is one of the major ISKCON temples in the world. It is located in Vrindavan, Mathura, and dedicated to Krishna and Balarama.

mandirs.Name: Rang Ji Mandir Vrindavan
mandirs.description: Shri Ranganath is the form of Lord Vishnu. The literal meaning of 'Ranganath' is 'lord of the gathering place'. This temple is dedicated to him and built in South Indian style.

mandirs.Name: Janambhumi Mathura
mandirs.description: The Krishna Janmasthan Temple Complex is a group of Hindu temples in Mathura, believed to be the birthplace of Lord Krishna. Major temples include Keshavdev, Garbh Griha, and Bhagvata Bhavan.

mandirs.Name: Radha Raman Mandir
mandirs.description: The Radha Raman Temple is one of the oldest in Vrindavan, established by Gopala Bhatta Goswami in 1542 CE. It houses a self-manifested deity of Radha Raman (Krishna).

mandirs.Name: Radha Vallabh Mandir
mandirs.description: Radha Vallabh Temple, one of the oldest in Vrindavan, is dedicated to Radha and Krishna. Established by the Vallabha sect in the 16th century, it's a key pilgrimage site.

mandirs.Name: Nidhivan Mandir
mandirs.description: Nidhivan is a sacred grove associated with divine pastimes of Krishna with Radha and gopis. It's considered spiritually potent and mysterious by devotees.

mandirs.Name: Radha Gopinath Mandir
mandirs.description: Radha Gopinath Temple is one of the seven ancient temples in Vrindavan, established by Gaudiya Vaishnavas. It houses deities of Radha and Gopinath (Krishna).

mandirs.Name: Radha Madan Mohan Mandir
mandirs.description: This temple is the oldest in Vrindavan and associated with Sanatana Goswami. It houses the deity of Madan Mohan, another form of Krishna.
